code: import React from'react';import trashPath from"../images/trash.svg";import{CurrentUserContext}from'../contexts/CurrentUserContext.js';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Card(props){var currentUser=React.useContext(CurrentUserContext);var isOwn=props.card.owner._id===currentUser._id;var cardDeleteButtonClassName="card__delete ".concat(isOwn?'card__delete_visible':'card__delete_hidden');var isLiked=props.card.likes.some(function(i){return i._id===currentUser._id;});var cardLikeButtonClassName="card__like ".concat(isLiked?'card__like_act':'');function handleClick(){props.onCardClick(props.card);}function handleLikeClick(){props.onCardLike(props.card);}function handleDeleteClick(){props.onCardDelete(props.card);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"places__item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"button card__delete ".concat(cardDeleteButtonClassName),onClick:handleDeleteClick,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:trashPath,alt:"Trash icon"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card__image",style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(props.card.link,")")},onClick:handleClick}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card__caption",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"card__text",children:props.card.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card__like-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"button card__like ".concat(cardLikeButtonClassName),onClick:handleLikeClick}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card__like-count",children:props.card.likes.length})]})]})]})});}export default Card;
